title: Sekela i-Orbital Temple - Joyina Imishini
heading: Sekela Orbital Temple
vision: Ngomhla zingama-28 kuNovemba 2025 , i-Orbital Temple izokwethulwa isuka e -India ngerokhethi ye-ISRO . Isathelayithi yobuciko ebambe iqhaza evela eGlobal South, iyitshe lesikhumbuzo sokufakwa okuqinile, inkundla yemfundo, kanye ne-catalyst yezingxoxo zomhlaba wonke mayelana nekusasa labangcwele enkathini yobuchwepheshe, i-AI kanye nokuhlola indawo.

accomplished.heading: Esikufezile
accomplished.content: Ngemva kweminyaka emine yocwaningo nentuthuko, umsebenzi usulungile. Sesiqedile ukuthuthukiswa kwezingxenyekazi zekhompiyutha kanye nesofthiwe yesathelayithi, saphumelela ukuhlolwa kwe-shaker okusemthethweni okudingekayo ekutholeni isitifiketi sendiza, futhi saphothula inkontileka yethu ne-ISRO. Isathelayithi yakhiwe. Ubuchwepheshe buyasebenza. Sisuliwe ukuze siqalise.

needs.heading: Esikudingayo Ukusekelwa
needs.intro: Ukuze siqedele lo msebenzi oyingqopha-mlando futhi andise umthelela wawo, sidinga ukusekelwa kwezingxenye ezinhlanu ezibalulekile:

decade.heading: Ishumi Leminyaka Elizayo
decade.paragraph1: Eminyakeni eyi-10 ezayo, lesi sathelayithi sizozungeza uMhlaba, siphendula amagama athunyelwe kuwo wonke amagumbi omhlaba. Uhlelo lwezemfundo luhlose ukuqeqesha izinkulungwane zentsha kubuchwepheshe besathelayithi, ukwephula i -Space Gap for the Global South. Idokhumentari izofinyelela izigidi emhlabeni wonke, ivuse izingxoxo mayelana nokuba yingxenye, inkumbulo, kanye nokungcwele.
decade.paragraph2: I-Orbital Temple ibambisene no -Sathi Roy kanye ne -The Roy Foundation ukwenza lo mbono weshumi leminyaka ubaluleke ngokwesiko. I-Roy Foundation iyinhlangano engenzi nzuzo ezinikele ekwandiseni ukufinyelela emfundweni engokomoya, ukuphulukiswa ngokomzwelo, namathuluzi okwazi emiphakathini enganakiwe emhlabeni wonke, ehlanganisa ukuhlakanipha kwakudala nobuchwepheshe besimanje ukuze bakhe umhlaba oqaphela kakhudlwana, oxhumene, nonobubele. Ngokubambisana, sakha ingqalasizinda ukuqinisekisa ukuthi i-Orbital Temple iba umnyakazo ongapheli ofinyelela imiphakathi emhlabeni wonke.
decade.paragraph3: Ukusekela kwakho akuxhasi nje ukuqaliswa; idala umnyakazo ozonanela iminyaka eyishumi futhi ikhuthaze isizukulwane esilandelayo samaciko asemkhathini nonjiniyela.

individualDonations.heading: Iminikelo Ngamunye
individualDonations.intro: Joyina i-mission ezingeni elisebenzela wena. Abasekeli ngabanye bayisisekelo salo msebenzi oyingqopha-mlando.

orbitalFriend.title: Umngane we-Orbital
orbitalFriend.benefits: Owamukelayo: Igama kuwebhusayithi yohlu lokuhlonipha · Isitifiketi somuntu siqu se-orbital lapho kwethulwa isathelayithi · Ikhredithi yedokhumentari yokubonga · Irisidi elidonswa intela

satelliteSupporter.title: Umsekeli wesathelayithi
satelliteSupporter.benefits: Uthola: Zonke izinzuzo zoMngane we-Orbital · Ukufinyelela kohlelo lokusebenza lokulandela ngomkhondo ngesathelayithi okukhethekile · Umculi umlayezo wevidiyo wokubonga · Irisidi ebanjwa intela

spaceAdvocate.title: Ummeli wasemkhathini
spaceAdvocate.benefits: Uthola: Zonke izinzuzo Zomsekeli Wesathelayithi · Igama eliphrintiwe kumakhredithi edokhumentari · Isimemo sokuhlolwa kwedokhumenti yangasese · Izibuyekezo zekota ezivela eqenjini · Irisidi elidonswa intela

fundingOpportunities.heading: Ngenisa Ingxenye Ethize
fundingOpportunities.intro: Umnikelo wakho uxhasa ngokuqondile izici ezithile zemishini. Khetha lokho okukhuluma nawe, noma hlanganisa okuningi ukuze udale umthelela omkhulu.

launch.title: Ngezimali Zokwethula Isikhala
launch.description: Ukwethulwa kwangempela kubiza ngerokhethi ye-ISRO ngoNovemba 28, 2025 . Lokhu kuthumela i-Orbital Temple ku-orbit, lapho izohlala khona iminyaka eyishumi njengesathelayithi yobuciko ebamba iqhaza kanye nethempeli esibhakabhakeni, elifinyeleleka kunoma ubani emhlabeni.
launch.benefits: Uthola: Isihloko esithi "Launch Sponsor" · Okufakiwe kukho konke okushicilelwe kwabezindaba · Ukwaziswa kwedokhumenti esesikrinini · Ukufinyelela kwe-VIP ukuze uqalise imicimbi · Joyina amakholi wevidiyo njalo ngekota no-Edson kanye nethimba lemishini · Isitifiketi esinedatha yesathelayithi ye-orbital · Irisidi elidonswa intela

travel.title: Ngenisa imali ngohambo lweciko oluya e-India
travel.description: Izindleko zokuhamba, indawo yokuhlala, nezokukhiqiza zeciko u-Edson Pavoni kanye nethimba eliyinhloko ukuze babone ukwethulwa e -India ngoNovemba 28, 2025 . Lolu hambo lubalulekile ekuqoshweni kwamadokhumenti, ukusakazwa kwabezindaba, nokumela i-Global South kulesi sikhathi esiyingqophamlando.
travel.benefits: Owamukelayo: Ngiyabonga mathupha kumculi · Ukufinyelela kwedokhumenti ngemuva · Igama elikumakhredithi amadokhumenti · Irisidi elidonswa intela

carbon.title: Ngezimali Uhlelo Lwe-Carbon Offset
carbon.description: Konke ukukhishwa kwekhabhoni kuzoncishiswa, okuhlanganisa ukwethulwa kwerokhethi nokwakhiwa kwesathelayithi. Sisebenza nezinhlelo eziqinisekisiwe ze-carbon offset ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi lo mgomo awushiyi umkhondo wemvelo ongemuhle.
carbon.benefits: Uthola: Igama ohlwini lokuhlonishwa kwewebhusayithi · Isitifiketi esenziwe umuntu siqu · Irisidi elidonswa intela

education.title: Ngezimali Uhlelo Lwezemfundo
education.description: Yakha futhi uqalise isifundo esiphelele sezilimi eziningi sokufundisa intsha ye-Global South indlela yokwakha amasathelayithi. Kufaka phakathi ukuthuthukiswa kwekharikhulamu, ukukhiqizwa kwevidiyo, ukusingathwa kwenkundla, kanye nonyaka wokuqala wemifundaze yabafundi abangasebenzi. Kwakha ingqalasizinda ehlala njalo yemfundo yasemkhathini.
education.benefits: Uthola: Ukuqashelwa "Umxhasi Wokusungula Imfundo" · Imifundaze egameni lakho · Ifakwe ezintweni zokufundisa · Hlangana neqoqo lokuqala labafundi elixhaswe ngemali yakho yomfundaze (ngokoqobo noma mathupha) · Ingxenye yesici sedokhumentari · Ithuba lokukhuluma emicimbini yokwethulwa · Irisidi elidonswa intela

docPreProd.title: Ngenisa iDocumentary Pre-Production
docPreProd.description: Ngenisa imali ngesigaba sokuqala esithi "Yini Eyenza Ithempeli?" idokhumentari. Kubandakanya ukwenza izingxoxo ezijulile ezingu-2 e -India nabaholi bomcabango nabasebenza ngokomoya, ukuhamba kwezisebenzi ezincane nokukhiqiza, kanye nokuhlelwa kwezithombe zangaphambi kokukhiqizwa. Lesi sigaba sisungula isisekelo sedokhumentari futhi siqinisekisa isiqondiso sokudala.
docPreProd.benefits: Uthola: Ikhredithi Yomdidiyeli Ohlanganisa Naye · Igama kumakhredithi amadokhumenti · Ukuhlolwa kwangasese kwezithombe eziqoshiwe zangaphambi kokukhiqizwa · Ukufinyelela ngemuva · Irisidi elidonswa intela

docProd.title: Ngenisa iDocumentary Production
docProd.description: Qedela ukukhiqizwa nokukhiqizwa kwangemuva kokuthi "Yini Eyenza Ithempeli?" , idokhumentari yesici ehlola ukuhlangana kobuciko, ubuchwepheshe, nokungcwele. Kufaka phakathi ukuqoshwa kwefilimu emazweni amaningi, izingxoxo ezengeziwe nabaholi bomcabango, ukuhlela okuphelele, ukugreda kwemibala, idizayini yomsindo, nokuhlolwa kokuqala e -India nase -NYC .
docProd.benefits: Uthola: Ikhredithi Yomkhiqizi Omkhulu · Okufakwe ekuvuleni amakhredithi · Ukuhlolwa okuyimfihlo kwezivakashi zakho · Izimemo zombukiso wokuqala emhlabeni (womabili amadolobha) · Isidlo sakusihlwa sangasese no-Edson kanye nomqondisi wamadokhumentari ngaphambi komdlalo wokuqala · Ukufinyelela ngemva kwesigcawu · Irisidi elibanjwa intela

artCollector.title: Iba Nguwe Kuphela Umqoqi Wezobuciko Wethempeli Le-Orbital
artCollector.imageCaption: Ithempeli le-Orbital ku-13th Mercosul Biennial, ePorto Alegre. Isithombe nguClara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: Amasathelayithi amathathu afanayo akhelwe le mishini. Omunye uzokwethulwa emkhathini ngoNovemba 28, 2025. Umuntu uya emibukisweni yasemnyuziyamu emhlabeni wonke. Enye ibekelwe umqoqi ophanayo ofuna ukuxhasa ngezimali lo mbono futhi abe nocezu lomlando wobuciko basemkhathini.
artCollector.paragraph2: Lokhu akuwona umfanekiso; ingesinye seziphuphutheki ezintathu zokuqala. Umkhumbi-mkhathi osebenza ngokugcwele futhi ongumfanekiso oqoshiwe . Isathelayithi ikala 5cm³ futhi inesisindo esingu -245g , nedome elenziwe ngegolide .
artCollector.paragraph4: Njengomqoqi, uzothola ukufakwa okufanayo okudalelwe i- 13th Mercosul Biennial , isibonisi esiphelele seminyuziyamu esibonisa isathelayithi njengobuciko nobuchwepheshe. Lokhu kufakwa kukhonjiswe ezindaweni ezinkulu zamazwe ngamazwe futhi kumelele izinga eliphezulu kakhulu lokwethulwa kobuciko basemkhathini.
artCollector.paragraph5: Ukwesekwa kwakho kusiza ukuxhasa wonke umbono: ukwethulwa, uhlelo lwezemfundo, kanye nedokhumentari ezovusa izingxoxo zomhlaba wonke mayelana nokungcwele esikhathini sobuchwepheshe, i-AI kanye nokuhlola indawo. Igama lakho lihlangana unomphela nalo msebenzi oyingqophamlando.

gratitude.heading: Ngokubonga Kubalandeli Bethu
gratitude.intro: I-Orbital Temple yenziwa izikhungo, abantu ngabanye, kanye namakholwa ekufakweni okuqinile aqondayo ukuthi ubuciko budala izinto ezicatshangelwayo zakusasa.

pearmill.title: Umsekeli Wokusungula
pearmill.description: I-Pearmill ingelinye lama-ejensi wokumaketha akhula ngokushesha kakhulu e-US, iqembu labaklami, abakhangisi, nonjiniyela abasebenza ndawonye ukuze basize ukukhulisa ezinye zeziqalo eziyisithonjana kakhulu emhlabeni. Ukwesekwa kwabo okuphanayo kwenze ithimba le-Orbital Temple likwazi ukuthenga izingxenye ezibalulekile futhi lithuthukise ihadiwe yomthombo ovulekile eyenza le mishini yesathelayithi yenzeke.

gratitude.yourName: Igama lakho lingaba lapha. Hlanganyela nathi ekudaleni umlando.

people.heading: Abantu Abasemuva Kwale Mishini
people.intro: I-Orbital Temple iyisibopho seminyaka eyi-10. Iholwa abantu ababili abachithe izimpilo zabo behlanganisa ubuciko, ubuchwepheshe, kanye nokuxhumana kwabantu, futhi abakha ingqalasizinda yokusekela lo mbono weshumi leminyaka elizayo.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni
edson.paragraph1: U-Edson ungumdwebi nochwepheshe ohlola ukusondelana kwabantu ezimpambanweni zobuciko nobuchwepheshe. Umsebenzi wakhe uhlanganisa ukufakwa kwezakhiwo, izinkondlo, ukuthwebula izithombe, nobuchwepheshe besathelayithi.
edson.paragraph2: Umsebenzi wakhe ukhonjiswe ku-13th Mercosul Biennial (Brazil), IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), kanye ne-NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Ngeminyaka engaphezu kwengu -20 emkhakheni wezobuciko nobuchwepheshe , usebenze namaqembu ahlakaniphile kuma -Olympics ka-2016 aseRio kanye ne -Inter American Development Bank . Eqanjwe njengomunye wochwepheshe abangu-50 baseBrazil abasungula izinto ezintsha yi-Proxxima Magazine, uthole imiklomelo emibili elandelanayo ye-IF Design (2017-2018) futhi waba owamanqamu we -Lumen Prize Futures Award . Umsebenzi wakhe ukhonjiswe emicimbini emibili ephindwe kabili futhi wethulwa eLudwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Brazil), kanye neDesign and Fashion Museum (Lisbon), nemibukiso eseNew York, Beijing, Singapore, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, nakwamanye amadolobha.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy
sathi.paragraph1: U-Sathi ungumsunguli we -The Roy Foundation , inhlangano engenzi nzuzo ezinikele ekwandiseni ukufinyelela emfundweni engokomoya, ukuphulukiswa ngokomzwelo, namathuluzi okuqaphela emiphakathini enganakiwe emhlabeni jikelele. Isisekelo sibambisene nezikole, izikhungo zamasiko, nezinhlangano zasendaweni ukuze zisabalalise amathuluzi ezempilo axhaswe yi-AI, ikharikhulamu yomphakathi, kanye nemidiya ekhuthaza uguquko.
sathi.paragraph2: Ngesizinda sesayensi yezinzwa, ukuqeqesha, kanye nobuholi, i-Sathi yakhe futhi yahola amaqembu eNyakatho Melika naseNdiya, ekhiqiza amaRandi ayizigidi ezingu-600 ekuthengisweni konyaka emsebenzini owodwa. Uphinde abe ngumsunguli we- OHM , inhlangano yezomoya yedijithali-yokuqala, Umsunguli Wokubambisana we -SUTE (isiteji sehhovisi eliqhutshwa yi-AI), futhi usebenza njengoMeluleki kanye neNhloko Yomhlaba Wonke Yokukhula kwe -RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Njengowesifazane wase-Bengali-American ohlanganisa amafilosofi aseMpumalanga naseNtshonalanga, uSathi uletha umbono oyingqayizivele ekunyakaza okungokomoya nobuciko ekhulwini lama-21. Ngenethiwekhi ekhulayo yabalandeli abangu-65,000+ kanye nokuvela ku-inthanethi okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-40 , wakha imiphakathi yomhlaba wonke exhumanisa ukwehlukana kwamasiko nokomoya.

people.together: Ngokubambisana ne-The Roy Foundation, sakha umkhankaso weminyaka eyi-10 ohlanganisa ezobuciko, ubuchwepheshe, imfundo, kanye nokungcwele, siqala ngokwethulwa ngesathelayithi ngomhla ka-28 Novemba 2025, futhi siqhubeke nomkhankaso ozofinyelela imiphakathi enganakiwe emhlabeni wonke futhi ukhuthaze isizukulwane esilandelayo.

join.heading: Sijoyine
join.content: Isathelayithi yakhiwe. Ubuchwepheshe sebulungile. Idethi yokwethulwa isethiwe: Novemba 28, 2025 . Lesi yisikhathi sokujoyina umkhankaso ocabanga kabusha ukuthi yini ubuciko obungayenza, ukuthi ingaya kuphi, nokuthi ingasebenzela bani.

fundSpecific.heading: Ngenisa Ingxenye Ethize noma Iba Uzakwethu Osungulayo
fundSpecific.description: Khetha elinye lamathuba oxhaso angenhla, buza mayelana nokuba umqoqi wezobuciko, noma xoxa ngoxhaso lwangokwezifiso oluhambisana nombono wakho.

generalDonation.heading: Yenza umnikelo odonswa intela
generalDonation.description: Yonke iminikelo, emikhulu noma emincane, isekela umgomo futhi idonswa intela ngomxhasi wethu wezezimali, i-Field.

taxInfo.heading: Ukunikeza Okudonswa Kwentela
taxInfo.paragraph1: I-Orbital Temple iphrojekthi exhaswe ngezimali ye- The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , inhlangano engenzi nzuzo engu -501(c)(3) ezinze eNew York. Yonke iminikelo yase-US idonswa intela ngokwezinga elivunyelwe umthetho.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
Inkundla
75 Maiden Lane, Suite 906
ENew York, NY 10038
thefield.org
taxInfo.paragraph3: Uma unikela ngesheke, sicela ukhokhele ku -Performance Zone Inc. ngememo: "Edson Pavoni: Orbital Temple"
